column1: Which genres of video games do you most often play? Tick all that apply.
column2: On average, how many hours of video games do you play every week? (Please enter a whole, numeric value.)
column4: Rate the following statement: "Video games make me happy."
column5: Rate the following statement: "I think video games are beneficial to me."
column6: Rate the following statement: "Sometimes, video games negatively affect my mood and can make me violent at times."
column7: Rate the following statement: "Video games have negatively affected my relationships, including my friends, family, and loved ones."
column8: Rate the following statement: "Video games have improved my cognitive abilities or have made me smarter."
column9: Why do you play video games? (Tick all that apply.)
column10: What is your GPA? Please enter a floating point value between 0-4. (This will be confidential. If you are no longer in school, please enter your last GPA.)
